title: Summer Internship and Research Scholars at EPFL
content: EPFL offers Summer internships for BSc and MSc students as well as Research Scholar fellowships for MSc students. The goal of the internship program is to allow top international students in Computer Science and Engineering, Telecommunications or Electrical Engineering to discover our campus and participate in resarch activities. Comeplete information about this program can be found on the website: http://ic.epfl.ch/computer-science/summer-at-epfl The Research Scholars MSc program offers incoming MSc students an opportunity to collaborate on research projects during their studies. Complete information about this program can be found on the website: http://ic.epfl.ch/ResearchScholars
